name: CARE - Community Ailment Redressal Establishment

address: No.1/1, St. Xavier Street, Lourdhu Nagar,

briefDescription: Community Ailment Redressal Establishment is a benevolent, nonprofit able and non-governmental organization working for the wellbeing of marginalized people in Vellore and Thiruvannamalai Districts in Tamilnadu state. It is a registered organization and was registered under Indian Trust act in 2004 with committed social scientists and social reformers.  Currently this organization is involved in organizing programs for homeless people and street children, creating awareness on STI, HIV / AIDS and Tuberculosis, and giving counselling to the people with various problems.
